select b.* from (select rownum rn, a.* from (select * from farmbnb
where dst1=#{dst1}
) a
WHERE rownum <= #{page} * 9) b WHERE b.rn > (#{page}-1) * 9
order by board_no desc
order by price
order by price desc

select * from farmbnb f join (select mem_no, name, id, email, zip, nick, addr as mem_adr, deta_addr as mem_adrDeta, mbl from member natural join member_detail) m on f.mem_no = m.mem_no where board_no= #{boardNo}
mapper.insert:
select 'BNB' || LPAD(bnb_seq.nextval, 6, '0') from dual
insert into farmbnb( board_no, MEM_NO, TITLE, DST1, ZIP, ADDR, ADDR_DETAIL, PRICE, REP, LEND_STR_DATE, LEND_END_DATE, DETA_DESCT, LATI, LONGI) values(#{boardNo}, #{memNo}, #{title}, #{dst1}, #{zip}, #{addr}, #{addrDetail}, #{price}, #{rep}, #{lendStrDate}, #{lendEndDate}, #{detaDesct}, #{lati}, #{longi})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(rsv_date, 'yyyy-fmmm-dd') rsv_date from( SELECT lend_str_date + (LEVEL) AS rsv_date FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN lend_str_date < TRUNC(sysdate) THEN sysdate ELSE lend_str_date END AS lend_str_date, lend_end_date FROM farmbnb WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}) CONNECT BY LEVEL <= lend_end_date - lend_str_date + 1) a WHERE EXISTS (SELECT qty FROM payment_detail WHERE a.rsv_date BETWEEN rsv_str_date AND rsv_end_date AND board_no = #{boardNo})
